DOC.brief_summary: In France , use humidify system oxygen therapy non heat device weak efficiency non-proven clinical benefit . This study aim assess lack benefit non-heated humidification compare humidification , regard comfort patient receive oxygen therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Aiming Assessing Effect Humidification Comfort Patient Receiving Oxygen Therapy
DOC.criteria: Admission Intensive Care Unit Oxygen therapy start less two hour ICU Age 18 Pregnancy Participation trial endpoint absence registration french health care system patient protect law tracheotomised intubated patient Patient non invasive ventilation Oxygen therapy start two hour ICU moribund
